headline: Is Johnson Controls International (JCI) the Best ADR Stock to Buy According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Best ADR Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE:JCI) stands against the other best ADR stocks.
